content: inspired by/modified from knitting kninja s dapper herringbone scarf 1 this scarf was designed to show off handpainted or variegated yarns breaking up random mixtures of hues into strong slanting rays of color it features a knitted-in i-cord selvage and a diagonal slipped-stitch rib pattern that is reversible and lies flat 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/dapper-herringbone-scarf
